description: Elm leaves texture with distinctive yellower green color and characteristic elm seed clusters

base_colors.note: Yellower green than standard leaves with warmer tone

light_specks.description: Light brown elm seed clusters characteristic of elm trees

color_adjustment.note: Transform leaf color to light brown elm seeds

generation_algorithm.step1: Generate triple noise: sin(x*1.1 + y*0.8)*0.3 + cos(x*0.9 + y*1.2)*0.2 + sin((x+y)*0.6)*0.4
generation_algorithm.step3: Apply base colors: r = 45 + leafNoise * 50, g = 120 + leafNoise * 70, b = 35 + leafNoise * 30
generation_algorithm.step4: Apply elm seeds at pattern coordinates (replace with fixed colors)
generation_algorithm.step5: Apply edge transparency for pixels within 2 pixels of edge
generation_algorithm.step6: Clamp all color values to [0, 255] range
generation_algorithm.note: Triple noise generation similar to stone texture but with leaf-specific parameters

metadata.purpose: JSON conversion of hardcoded ELM_LEAVES texture algorithm

validation_notes.pattern_complexity: Triple noise generation with seed patterns and edge transparency
special_features: Yellower green base color distinctive from other leaves
Elm seed clusters at 6x6 modulo pattern
RGBA format with alpha channel variations
